results.title: Ruthless people
results.creator_credit: Touchstone Pictures, Silver Screen Partners II, Wagner Productions, Michael Peyser, Jim Abrahams, David Zucker and Jerry Zucker
results.brief_description: A black comedy tale of two kindly kidnappers, Ken and Sandy Kessler, exacting revenge on the rip-off merchant Sam (Danny DeVito) by taking his spoilt rich wife, Barbara (Bette Midler) as hostage. However when the Kesslers try to claim their ransom, the obnoxious and spiteful Sam, who is delighted at the opportunity to be rid of the wife he hates so much, refuses to pay. Barbara joins forces with the Kesslers and together they plan their revenge. Cast includes Judge Reinhold, Helen Slater, Anita Morris and Bill Pullman in his debut performance.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Touchstone Pictures, Silver Screen Partners II, Wagner Productions, Michael Peyser, Jim Abrahams, David Zucker and Jerry Zucker

results.title: Ruth Stout's garden
results.brief_description: A revealing portrait of a charming individualist illustrating that age need not be a barrier to continued productivity and creativity. Ruth Stout, now in her tenth decade, remains active writing books, contributing regularly to periodicals, lecturing and perfecting her ‘no dig/no work’ method of gardening.

results.title: Rusty: the great rescue
results.creator_credit: Saban Entertainment, Craig Golin and Shuki Levy
results.brief_description: Rusty is a lovable, trusty beagle that lives at an animal shelter full of a great variety of animals. The human couple who run the shelter are grandparents to two recently orphaned kids. All seems fine until two crooks steal some puppies in order to take the trust fund from the kids. Rusty and his animal friends set out on an adventurous rescue to put things straight. Talking animals and colourful country setting make this a film for the family to enjoy. Directed by Shuki Levy. Cast includes Hal Holbrook, Rue McClanahan, Laraine Newman. Voices provided by Suzanne Somers, Rodney Dangerfield and Bobcat Goldthwait.

results.title: Rusting world = Declin
results.creator_credit: National Film Board of Canada, Margaret Pettigrew and Laurent Coderre
results.brief_description: The scene is a desolate landscape which reveals no signs of life. Out of the stillness emerge two opposing factions, both wanting possession of a shiny object. This allegorical film suggests a decaying world created by greed, but the ultimate interpretation rests with the viewer.

results.title: Rust bucket
results.brief_description: A family deliberates over the financial difficulties of having their family station wagon repaired. Knowing that the car is insured for the full amount, they call on the services of a friend, with shocking results.

results.title: Rust and Bone
results.creator_credit: Virginie Montel, Jacques Audiard, Pascal Caucheteux, Martine Cassinelli, Why Not Productions, Les Films du Fleuve, France 2 Cinéma, Page 114, Lumière, Lunanime, Ciné+, Centre du Cinéma et de l'Audiovisuel de la Fédération Wallonie-Bruxelles, VOO, Vlaams Audiovisueel fonds, Région Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur, Département des Alpes-Maritimes, Casa Kafka Pictures Movie Tax Shelter Empowered by Dexia, Canal+, RTBF, France Télévisions, Michel Barthélémy, Thomas Bidegain, Craig Davidson and Alix Raynaud
results.brief_description: Put in charge of his young son, Ali leaves Belgium for Antibes to live with his sister and her husband as a family. Ali’s bond with Stephanie, a killer whale trainer, grows deeper after Stephanie suffers a horrible accident.

constellations_other.name: Welcome to Chechnya: tales through time
constellations_other.description: Documentary Welcome to Chechnya used ground-breaking deep fake technology to hide the identities of LGBTQ+ people fleeing a government-orchestrated genocide in Chechnya.

results.title: Russian rooster
results.brief_description: The wild chase of hunters after a rooster becomes even more frenzied with background music of Rimsky - Korsakoffs “La Coq D’or”. The combination of music and animated figures drawn directly on the film creates an exciting visual experience. And don’t be so sure about who wins the chase.

results.title: Russian Doll
results.brief_description: Nadia keeps dying and reliving her 36th birthday party. She’s trapped in a surreal time loop — and staring down the barrel of her own mortality. Created by created by Natasha Lyonne, Leslye Headland, and Amy Poehler, this comedy-drama received much critical acclaim.

constellations_other.name: Power and infamy
constellations_other.description: Beginning with an anamorphic image of Napoleon III, this Constellation focuses on representations of the distorted perspective of patriarchal power.

results.description: Nadia keeps dying and reliving her 36th birthday party. She’s trapped in a surreal time loop — and staring down the barrel of her own mortality. Created by created by star Natasha Lyonne, along with Leslye Headland, and Amy Poehler, this comedy-drama received much critical acclaim.

results.title: Russian ark [DVD]
results.creator_credit: Egoli Tossell Film, Hermitage Bridge Studio, Andrei Deriaban, Andrew Deryabin, Jens Meurer, Karsten Stoter and Alexander Sokurov
results.brief_description: Hailed as a masterpiece and a breakthrough in digital cinema, this single-take, feature length film is set in the Hermitage in St. Petersburg. Throughout the piece, Sukurov uses a narrator to guide the viewer through the Hermitage past innumerable grand works, whilst also presenting history through a series of characters that appear to drift across the camera space, almost incidentally rather than deliberately. Elaborate costumes, sumptuous works of art and the ambitious scale make this a unique non-linear cinematic experience. In Russian with English subtitles. Also available on VHS [318954].

results.title: Russian Ark
results.headline_credit: Canada, Denmark, Finland, Germany, Japan and Russia, 2002
results.brief_description: A 2002 experimental historical drama film by Alexander Sokurov features an unnamed narrator wandering through the Winter Palace in Saint Petersburg, who implies that he died in some horrible accident and is a ghost drifting through the corridors.

constellations_other.name: Tracking cinema
constellations_other.description: A constellation looking at the evolution of the tracking / dolly shot.
